content.text: 在不替换的情况下从数组中返回多个随机元素。Returns multiple random elements from an array without replacement
包含随机选择元素的数组。Array containing randomly selected elements
当arr不是数组或num不是数字时抛出错误。When arr is not an array or num is not a number

```ts
// Basic usage
sampleSize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 2); // -> [3, 1] (randomly selected)
sampleSize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 3); // -> [5, 2, 4] (randomly selected)
```

```ts
// Edge cases
sampleSize([], 2); // -> []
sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 0); // -> []
sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 5); // -> [2, 1, 3] (returns all elements when num > array length)
```

summary.text: 要从中采样的数组（将被复制以避免变异）。Array to sample from (will be copied to avoid mutation)

text.comment: 要从中采样的数组（将被复制以避免变异）。Array to sample from (will be copied to avoid mutation)

summary.text: 要采样的元素数量（默认：1）。Number of elements to sample (default: 1)

text.comment: 要采样的元素数量（默认：1）。Number of elements to sample (default: 1)

Function:

sampleSize

Description:

在不替换的情况下从数组中返回多个随机元素。Returns multiple random elements from an array without replacement

Returns:

包含随机选择元素的数组。Array containing randomly selected elements

Throws:

当arr不是数组或num不是数字时抛出错误。When arr is not an array or num is not a number

Example:
// Basic usage
sampleSize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 2); // -> [3, 1] (randomly selected)
sampleSize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 3); // -> [5, 2, 4] (randomly selected)
Example:
// Edge cases
sampleSize([], 2); // -> []
sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 0); // -> []
sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 5); // -> [2, 1, 3] (returns all elements when num > array length)
Example:
// String arrays
sampleSize(['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'], 2); // -> ['c', 'a'] (randomly selected)
